Name: Isla Sinaloa
About the game: Isla Sinaloa is a relaxing game full of activities to enjoy on a peaceful island in a universe full of friendly animals KEY FEATURES - Ride a dolphin and go up in a hot air balloon - Explore labyrinths, underground temples, mines and volcanic caves - Run a farm with crop management and cows and chickens - 20+ mini-games including a food truck that you get to run - Over 30 animal characters to get to know and become friends with - Over 500+ items to collect and donate for island building exhibits - Beautiful and vibrant zoo, museum and botanical gardens - Customize your character with 100s of outfit and character combinations - 100s of craftable items to decorate your island and home - Many holidays are celebrated on your island - You can share your island with your friends - Full of love and little surprises!
Meta Title: Isla Sinaloa: Oct 10, 2022, EnsenaSoft and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Isla Sinaloa? Check out the release date (Oct 10, 2022), developer insights from EnsenaSoft, and a complete game summary.
